content.prompt: In early modern Europe, which of the following most directly undermined the guild system?

choices.label: Entrepreneurial expansion of manufacturing into the countryside
The increased demand for products from the Far East and the New World, such as spices and silk
The imposition of high tariffs on imported goods
The use of credit in business transactions
The expansion of the supply of precious metals

topic.text: 1.11: Causation in the Renaissance and Age of Discovery

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
